backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profile storage with access-control checks for viewing and updating profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions using warm OKLCH variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling Internet Identity auth, loading profile and role data, and rendering status UI.
frontend/src/components/AdminOnlyActions: Admin-only UI allowing role assignment with validation and backend-enforced authorization.
frontend/src/components/AdminOwnerStatus: Component displaying user profile, principal, and role badges with admin-only controls.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button managing Internet Identity login/logout and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal component that collects a user's name and saves their profile via a mutation with loading and validation states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and modifying user profile and role data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom warm-themed color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, and animations using custom CSS variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for implementing a backendâ€‘enforced first-login admin pattern, listing existing features, new feature requests, and architectural notes. Captures requirements for owner initialization, admin checks, and frontend integration.
